name: Police quest 1 - 30th anniversary Miami vice tweak
name_original: Police quest 1 - 30th anniversary Miami vice tweak
description:
30th anniversary Mod of Police quest 1 by Sierra 1987.
I always wanted a miami vice (TV show-30th anniversary aswell) mod of this game with tweaks to the plot and characters to allow another reason to play through this awesome game. First attempt at AGI Studio, Piceditor.
